page.title: 17POPULATION
page.content: The population of the village has been gradually increasing over the last twenty years and particularly twelve years ago.When a large{Private housing {estate}was built.The population now stands at about seven hundred and has now stablized. Families are moving into the village because the {property {values}are lower than Exeter.Many people move to Devon for their {work} and live in Lapford.Devon is a popular place for {retirement}and there are many retired people in the village who have moved from another part of the country to Devon.Although many parents come from all over the country most of their children were born in the village .There are now more shops in the village because of increased population.
